headline.main: A RELIGIOUS ROMANCE.; Denoument of the Starr Abduction.

docs.lead_paragraph: Religious romance grows fashionable these days. Does not a branch of the Anglican aristocracy make it a specialite? And PUSEY is its pro phet. The antique austerities and siucerities live no longer in the faith of reason. Prety must take on a purple haze to be patronized, and martyrdom is rapidly being metamorphosed into melodrama.

docs.snippet: Political affairs continue chiefly to occupy public attention. In my last I gave you the substance of charges made on the stump by Senator BRODDERICK, against his colleague, Dr. GWIN, and the Hon. M. S. LATHAM, Administration candidate for...

headline.main: CALIFORNIA.; Politics in California--Progress of the Campaign--Senator Broderick and Mr. Latham--Speech of Mr. Latham--Dr. Gwin Replying to his Colleague--The Republicans on Citizenship--New Quicksilver Mike--The Overland Mail--Troubles at Fort Smith with the Way Mails.

docs.lead_paragraph: Political affairs continue chiefly to occupy public attention. In my last I gave you the substance of charges made on the stump by Senator BRODDERICK, against his colleague, Dr. GWIN, and the Hon. M. S. LATHAM, Administration candidate for Governor--together with a synopsis of the letter of the Hon. FRANK TILFORD, vindicating Mr. LATHAM, and flatly contradicting BRODERICK's assertions.

docs.lead_paragraph: Reader, the thing that we all need most is forgiveness of sins. We may get to beaven without money and without health. We shall ??ver get there without for guveness. Now, are your forgiven? Reader, I tell you this day, that to know year need of forgiveness is the first thing in true religion. Sin is a burden, and must be taken off. Sin is a defilement, and must be opened away.

docs.lead_paragraph: A young clerk belonging to a store in Market-street Philadelphia was very much exercised on Thursday, ?? the supposed loss of a $1,000 check that has been given to him to deposit. On receiving the check he placed it for safe keeping between the cases ?? large silver watch, which he had in his pocket, and then started for the bank, which was in the upper part of the city.

headline.main: A Plea for Light and Air.

docs.lead_paragraph: The month of August, which empties our school-houses and our churches of their usual inmates, fills them with all manner of painters and cleansers, with carvers and gliders, and " cunning artificers, skilled to work in purple and in blue, in fine linen and in crimson." docs.snippet: DOMESTIC MARKETS. In New-York, during the past week there has been less activity in all kinds of Wool. The demand from manufacturers and dealers has been restricted. The firmness of the principal holders has tended to check it. The reported receipts...
docs.lead_paragraph: DOMESTIC MARKETS. In New-York, during the past week there has been less activity in all kinds of Wool. The demand from manufacturers and dealers has been restricted. The firmness of the principal holders has tended to check it. The reported receipts have amounted to 1,400 bales Domestic and 326 bales Foreign.

headline.main: TWO DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; Progress of the French Disarmament. ONSOLS 95 a 95 1-8. Cotton Steady--Breadstuffs Dull--Provisions Firm. The Great Strike of English Laborers. THE GREAT EASTERN COMPLETED. ARRIVAL OF THE ASIA. STATE OF ITALY. Naval Armament of Great Britain. PEACE CONFERENCE AT ZURICH.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Asia, Capt. LOTT, which sailed from Liverpool at 1 o'clock P. M. on the 6th inst., arrived here yesterday at 12 o'clock M. The steamships Arago and Wiser, from New-York, arrived at Southampton on the morning of the 4th inst., within an hour or so of each other. The Vigo reached Queenstown about midnight on the 3d, and Liverpool about 24 hours later.

docs.snippet: By the arrival of the steamship Asia at this port, from Liverpool on the 6th inst., we have European intelligence two days later. There is nothing of striking interest. The session of the British Parliament was approaching its close. The...
docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the steamship Asia at this port, from Liverpool on the 6th inst., we have European intelligence two days later. There is nothing of striking interest. The session of the British Parliament was approaching its close. The deliberations were, however, of exclusively local importance.

docs.snippet: The fifth annual meeting of the American Normal School Association, which is composed of those who are personally employed in connection with the Normal Schools of the United States, is commencing its sessions this morning. There is a prospect of an...

headline.main: EDUCATION.; Convention of the Normal School Association at Trenton.

docs.lead_paragraph: The fifth annual meeting of the American Normal School Association, which is composed of those who are personally employed in connection with the Normal Schools of the United States, is commencing its sessions this morning. There is a prospect of an exceedingly interesting and profitable meeting, as there are already many prominent educators here, from different sections of the country.
